fr.global_regexpassw:
Le mot de passe doit contenir au moins 6 characteres dont:
1 Majuscule
1 Minuscule
1 Chiffre
1 Charactere special

en.global_regexpassw:
Password must contain at least 6 characters long including:
1 Uppercase
1 Lowercase
1 Numeric
1 Special character
